alert.note: Alert for Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:28PM EDT until August 08 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Oxford County in western Maine... Northeastern Coos County in northern New Hampshire... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 628 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Colebrook, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colebrook, Pittsburg, Dixville, Columbia, Clarksville, Upper Cupsuptic, Oxbow, Parkertown, Lynchtown, Parmachenee, Bowmantown, Stewartstown, Lower Cupsuptic, Seven Ponds, Stetsontown, Lincoln Plantation and Wentworth Location. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
